00008 #include "drive.h"

00015 uint8_t drive(uint8_t speed){
00016         uint8_t out = drive_front_free;
00017 
00018         copro_update();
00019         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00020 
00021         if(drive_isFrontFree()){
00022                 copro_setSpeed(speed,speed);
00023         }else{
00024                 copro_stop();
00025                 out = drive_direction_blocked;
00026         }
00027         //transmit the moved distance and the ir sensor values
00028         delay(100);
00029         drive_sendTicks();
00030         drive_sendIRDistance(0);
00031         return out;
00032 }
00033 
00039 uint8_t drive_getFreePath(){
00040 
00041         copro_update();
00042 
00043         if(drive_isFrontFree()){
00044                 return drive_front_free;
00045         }
00046         else if(drive_isRightFree()){
00047                 return drive_right_free;
00048         }
00049         else if(drive_isLeftFree()){
00050                 return drive_left_free;
00051         }
00052         else{
00053                 return drive_all_blocked;
00054         }
00055 }

00060 void drive_turn_left(){
00061         copro_setTargetRel(-27, 27, 10);
00062         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_left);
00063         drive_sendIRDistance(2000);
00064 }

00071         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfLeft);
00072         drive_sendIRDistance(2000);

00080         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_right);

00096 void drive_turn_around(){
00097         copro_setTargetRel(53, -53, 10);
00098         niboCom_putDircetionChange(niboCom_cmd_nibo_turn);
00099         drive_sendIRDistance(4000);

00106 uint8_t drive_isFrontFree(){
00107         if (copro_distance[1]/256 < IRDistance &&
00108                 copro_distance[2]/256 < IRDistance &&
00109                 copro_distance[3]/256 < IRDistance){
00110                 return drive_front_free;
00111         }
00112         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00113 }
00114 
00119 uint8_t drive_isRightFree(){
00120         if (copro_distance[0] / 256 < IRDistance && copro_distance[1] / 256 < IRDistance){
00121                                 return drive_right_free;
00122         }
00123         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00124 }
00125 
00130 uint8_t drive_isLeftFree(){
00131         if (copro_distance[4] / 256 < IRDistance && copro_distance[3] / 256 < IRDistance){
00132                 return drive_left_free;
00133         }
00134         else return drive_direction_blocked;
00135 }
00136 
00140 void drive_sendTicks(){
00141         copro_update();
00142 
00143         if(copro_ticks_l > 0){
00144                 niboCom_putDistance(copro_ticks_l);
00145         }
00146         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00147 }
00148 
00153 void drive_sendIRDistance(int ms){
00154         delay(ms);
00155         copro_resetOdometry(0, 0);
00156         copro_update();
00157         niboCom_putIRDistance(copro_distance);
00158 }
